SELECT profile.*, customer.customer_name, customer.customer_nnm, customer.customer_phone, customer.customer_address, customer.customer_birthday, customer.customer_gender, area.area1, area.area2, career.career_company, career.career_date, career.career_work, career.career_category, certificate.certificate_name, certificate.certificate_date, certificate.certificate_writing, skill.skill_content FROM profile JOIN customer ON profile.customer_id=customer.customer_id JOIN skill ON profile.profile_seq=skill.profile_seq JOIN area ON profile.profile_seq=area.profile_seq JOIN career ON profile.profile_seq=career.profile_seq JOIN certificate ON profile.profile_seq=certificate.profile_seq

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, sub.* FROM () sub)
WHERE rnum >= ((#{page} - 1 ) * #{perPage} + 1 ) and rnum <= ( #{page} * #{perPage})
ORDER BY profile_seq DESC
